entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bonavista 06:30 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -12.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -16.5°C

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries or snow squalls beginning this morning. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along exposed areas of the coast early this morning. Wind becoming southwest 60 gusting to 80 this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas this evening. Wind becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the morning then rising.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the morning then rising. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
